scsf
  • Reference
  • Articles
  • News

Common path forms.

Paths.

# S3 method for sf
sc_path(x, ...)

# S3 method for sfc
sc_path(x, ids = NULL, ...)

# S3 method for MULTIPOLYGON
sc_path(x, ...)

# S3 method for POLYGON
sc_path(x, ...)

# S3 method for LINESTRING
sc_path(x, ...)

# S3 method for MULTILINESTRING
sc_path(x, ...)

# S3 method for POINT
sc_path(x, ...)

# S3 method for MULTIPOINT
sc_path(x, ...)

# S3 method for GEOMETRYCOLLECTION
sc_path(x, ...)

Arguments

x
simple features object
...
arguments to methods
ids
object id, one for each object in the `sfc`

Examples

library(scsf)
sf_dataset <- sf::st_sf(geometry = sf::st_sfc(sfzoo[[2]]), a = 1)
PATH(sf_dataset)
#> $object
#> # A tibble: 1 × 2
#>       a  object_
#> * <dbl>    <chr>
#> 1     1 5301565d
#> 
#> $path
#> # A tibble: 6 × 3
#>   ncoords_    path_  object_
#>      <dbl>    <chr>    <chr>
#> 1        1 0f25a4ee 5301565d
#> 2        1 d8c7fc16 5301565d
#> 3        1 5f8e4f34 5301565d
#> 4        1 e93ebbfb 5301565d
#> 5        1 dde524b7 5301565d
#> 6        1 a097699c 5301565d
#> 
#> $vertex
#> # A tibble: 6 × 3
#>      x_    y_  vertex_
#>   <dbl> <dbl>    <chr>
#> 1   3.2   4.0 b412f482
#> 2   3.0   4.6 896bf4d7
#> 3   3.8   4.4 94fc512f
#> 4   3.5   3.8 2b3acfac
#> 5   3.4   3.6 32958a14
#> 6   3.9   4.5 f721b635
#> 
#> $path_link_vertex
#> # A tibble: 6 × 2
#>      path_  vertex_
#>      <chr>    <chr>
#> 1 0f25a4ee b412f482
#> 2 d8c7fc16 896bf4d7
#> 3 5f8e4f34 94fc512f
#> 4 e93ebbfb 2b3acfac
#> 5 dde524b7 32958a14
#> 6 a097699c f721b635
#> 
#> attr(,"class")
#> [1] "PATH" "sc"  
#> attr(,"join_ramp")
#> [1] "object"           "path"             "path_link_vertex" "vertex"
